title: New: Jamie Isaac – Wash
content:
It’s been over a month since we last heard from teenage sensation Jamie Isaac, which by his prolific standards, is too long.

Having played his debut live show in London last week, which (my sources tell me) went down a treat, Isaac has dropped a new track in the form of Wash. An ambient inspired number, keeping the vocals to a bare minimum thus allowing each word to gain far greater relevance, it’s another stunning progression of his ever-developing sound. Now with six tracks under his belt, Jamie Isaac is well and truly beginning to establish a name for himself, and it’s surely only a matter of time before the offers come calling. Stream Wash below.

Over me? say it quietly my sweet
And why can’t I feel your face? your washing over my escape.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
